data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Batna who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Batna, Algeria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Over 99.92 percent of the people of Batna are far from Jesus.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 1465 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Batna access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Batna who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bedouin, Nail people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Batna words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 764 believers in the state of Batna into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Batna.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Batna
location.cities_list: Batna, Barika, Aïn Touta, Merouana, Tazoult-Lambese
location.cities_list_w_pop: Batna (280,798), Barika (98,846), Aïn Touta (72,280), Merouana (47,646), Tazoult-Lambese (41,636)
